Header.title: Ulah film: your casting partner
Header.paragraph: Driven by love for people and stories, we are passionate about the art of filmmaking and the incredible talents that make it all possible.

About.paragraph: We understand that every film project is a masterpiece in the making, and the right cast can transform a story into something truly magical. That’s why we’re dedicated to connecting aspiring actors, talents, and industry professionals with the opportunities that can bloom for all parties.

Services.name: Film casting
Services.text: Main-, sideroles or extras - we have the experience and the team to deliver suitable cast for your film.

Services.name: Commercial casting
Services.text: No matter if it’s the commercial looks or edgy characters you’re looking - we got you!

Services.name: 3AD on set
Services.text: Directing extras on set and being the 2nd pair of eyes for 1AD

Services.name: Cast PA on set
Services.text: We take care of your talents on set like they’re on all-in vacation.
